# Modern Web Apps on Azure

> Building monolithic web applications with ASP.NET Core and deploying to Azure. Covers clean architecture, domain-driven design, testing strategies, and Azure deployment. For cloud patterns, see the Modern Web App pattern guidance at aka.ms/modern-web-app-pattern.

*Topics available: 11*

- [Architectural principles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/architectural-principles.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Architectural principles
- [Azure hosting recommendations for ASP.NET Core web apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/azure-hosting-recommendations-for-asp-net-web-apps.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Azure hosting recommendations for ASP.NET web apps
- [Choose between traditional web apps and single page apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/choose-between-traditional-web-and-single-page-apps.md): Learn how to choose between traditional web apps and single page applications (SPAs) when building web applications.
- [Common client-side web technologies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/common-client-side-web-technologies.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Common client-side web technologies
- [Common web application architectures](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/common-web-application-architectures.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Explore the common web application architectures
- [Developing ASP.NET Core MVC apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/develop-asp-net-core-mvc-apps.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | developing ASP.NET Core MVC Apps
- [Development process for Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/development-process-for-azure.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Development process for Azure
- [Architect modern web applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/index.md): A guide that provides end-to-end guidance on building monolithic web applications using ASP.NET Core and Azure.
- [Characteristics of modern web applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/modern-web-applications-characteristics.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Characteristics of modern web applications
- [Test ASP.NET Core MVC apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/test-asp-net-core-mvc-apps.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Test ASP.NET Core MVC Apps
- [Work with data in ASP.NET Core Apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/work-with-data-in-asp-net-core-apps.md): Architect Modern Web Applications with ASP.NET Core and Azure | Working with data in ASP.NET Core apps
